TextView.android:text: Use the following steps to connect your device over Wifi Direct (P2P) or install and run 'Wifi Direct Launcher' app on the phone for automatization.

1) Open Wifi settings on the phone 
2) Select Advanced (or Wifi direct if available) from the menu
3) If selected Advance at previous point, find Wifi Direct 
4) Wait for your phone to discover "Headunit Reloaded" group
5) On this device you will see a dialog showing your phone.
6) Select phone from dialog window (or select "Headunit Reloaded" from phone
7) Make sure you accesp the connection on the other device
Please note not all devices support Wifi Direct and some devices won\'t connect between each other, albeit infromation showing that they are connected.
